name: Kingdom Battle
description:
This is my entry for the GMTK2018 Jam 

My entry is an RTS where you cannot select any of your units, Every few seconds a new unit spawns for each side, and when you issue a command, all your units will move.  When they are within range of an enemy they will begin their attack. Destroy the enemy castle to win!

WASD - pans the camera
Left Click - Controls Units

Special thanks  to : http://www.abstractionmusic.com  for the music
And Special Thanks to https://kenney.nl/ for the artwork
